summary: Haunted by a horrible past, a Ukrainian young woman calculatedly insinuates herself into the life of a rich Italian family.
cast: Kseniya Rappoport|Michele Placido|Claudia Gerini|Piera Degli Esposti|Alessandro Haber|Clara Dossena|Ángela Molina|Margherita Buy|Pierfrancesco Favino|Nicola Di Pinto|Paolo Elmo|Simona Nobili|Elisa Morucci|Giulia Di Quilio|Pino Calabrese|Gisella Marengo|Gabriella Barbuti|Valeria Flore|Dante Alfonso Spadini
title: La desconocida
